title: Otoko Darake no Isekai Trip ~BL wa Okotowari~ - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Harem   Smut   Yaoi
tags: Appearance Different from Actual Age   Cheats   Cooking   Cute Protagonist   Game Elements   Knights   Parody   R-18   R*pe   S*aves   Special Abilities   Straight Uke   Tentacles   Transported to Another World
author: Sora Usagi
description:
One day, a typical high school boy, Kusuki Shiromu, was suddenly transported into another world.

“It can’t be helped that I transported, right? Yahooー! It’s the world I have always yearned for! All right, let’s create a harem!” Is what I thought but something feels wrong. The guild receptionist isn’t a girl and I haven’t seen any girls at all. Hmm? What happened to my dream of getting a beautiful cat-eared s*x s*ave? It seems that only males exist in this world. Ehh?! Change!!!>
